name: Dodging it
description:
Dodging it is a casual 3D game in which the objective is to dodge all the obstacles with a cube in order to reach the end of the level or to obtain more points in the infinite mode. There are many different skins and trails to choose from! Dodging It has 20 different levels and an infinite mode in which you can get a large number of gems to buy skins and trails in the store. 

Listen the Original Soundtrack!
